channel.title: Employee on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Employee on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: One on one meeting
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: 1 on 1 Our culture is founded upon the strong relationships between people. One-on-one meetings are the way to establish these relationships.

item.title: Continuing Education Allowance
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Continuing Education Allowance You will always grow by learning and playing with new and cool technologies. From books to conferences, you’ll get a yearly budget for your learning and development goals.

item.title: Reimbursement
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Reimbursement Sometimes the situation calls for realtime payment. Team lunch, device purchase, house cleaning, monthly drinking water. Normally, we pay it forward and claim those expense later.

item.title: Routine
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Work routine As stated in how we work, we keep the team small and follow the agile philosophy at scale.

item.title: Purpose
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Where we are heading We start with purpose. The mankind is here today because of 4 billion years of continuous evolution from a single cell to homo sapiens, through the stone age to bronze, iron, medieval to post-classical and renaissance.

item.title: Making a Career
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Making a Career The average tenure of employees working at many technology companies today is shockingly low. At both Amazon, Google and other companies, it’s just around one year.

item.title: Email Communication and Use
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Email Communication and Use We use email as our formal tool for both internal and external communication. Every email is utilized for a specific field, which comes along with different instructions.

item.title: How we keep things on track
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: How we keep things on track Building an effective company is like building good software: First, we define the specs.

item.title: Benefits & Perks
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Benefits & Perks Since most Dwarves Foundation employees work in Saigon, this section is written with that as the default.

item.title: FAQ
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: FAQ How to pronounce the company name? Dwarf is one of the hardest words to pronounce to the non-English speaker, but that’s what made we special.

item.title: Getting Started
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Getting Started Expectation Welcome onboard. Getting started at Dwarves Foundation can be overwhelming. Different roles have different expectation. Get to know who does what to warm up.

item.title: Leave Request
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Leave Request A consistent on leave process prevents a company from being accidentally disrupted when an employee request to be absent.

item.title: Moonlighting
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Moonlighting Moonlighting means working other professional, paid jobs outside of your work at Dwarves Foundation. It’s not a black and white topic.

item.title: Security Rules
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Basic Security Keeping laptops and phones secure is vitally important. We’re a software company and many of us have access to secure systems (both our own and our customers).

item.title: Tools and Systems
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Public-facing channel Website Foundation: dwarves.foundation Ventures: dwarves.ventures Careers: dwarves.careers Social Network Instagram: https://instagram.com/dwarves.foundation Facebook: https://facebook.com/dwarvesf Twitter: @dwarvesf Keybase: keybase.io/team/dwarvesf.alumni Tools & Systems Besides the customer-facing applications, like the different versions of the website, we have a number of internal systems that help us support, report, and operate the company.

item.title: What we stand for
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: What we stand for Empower Innovation with Software Craftsmanship Innovation happens. There are many startups found and raise fund every day.

item.title: Who does what
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Who does what Figuring out whom to bring a particular issue or question to shouldn’t be a guessing game. Most concerns fall pretty clearly within the responsibility of a specific team at Dwarves Foundation, and the head of that team should be the first point of contact.

item.title: You are Dwarves Foundation
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: You are Dwarves Foundation Everyone working at Dwarves Foundation represents Dwarves Foundation. When a customer gets a response from Quang on support, Quang is Dwarves Foundation.
